translation.en: Hey there, pretty.
translation.zh: 你好啊 美人

translation.en: What happened in there is what you young people refer to as epic.
translation.zh:
刚才在里面发生的事情
就是你们年轻人所指的 “蔚为壮观”

translation.en: Goddamn, Sax, you wreck my porcelain again?
translation.zh:
该死的 萨克斯
你又掰坏我的瓷器了？

translation.en: Maybe. Want to guess from which end?
translation.zh: 也许是吧？想猜猜是从哪头破开吗？

translation.en: -You costing me business, Sax. -Costing you business?
translation.zh:
-这是坏我生意 萨克斯
-坏你生意？

translation.en: I am single-handedly keeping this shithole in the black.
translation.zh: 这破酒吧能一直赚钱全都靠我

translation.en: You're going to miss me when I'm gone, Terrance.
translation.zh: 我不在了你会想我的 特伦斯

translation.en: -Not vodka. I give up, what is it? -Quit your bitching.
translation.zh:
-不是伏特加 我猜不到 这是啥？
-别抱怨了

translation.en: I could dissolve a body in this shit.
translation.zh: 这破玩意连尸体都能溶解

translation.en: [sighs] Goddamn Christmas miracle I'm still alive!
translation.zh: 该死的圣诞奇迹 我还活着

translation.en: Saving yourself for some lucky girl, I guess.
translation.zh: 我猜是因为要遇见某个幸运姑娘吧

translation.en: Well, ho, ho, ho. What's Santa got for me tonight?
translation.zh: 嚯嚯嚯 圣诞老人今晚要送我什么？

translation.en: Please just take it.
translation.zh: 你收下就是了

translation.en: Now, that's interesting.
translation.zh: 这下有意思了

translation.en: Going to be a busy holiday season for you and me both by the looks of it.
translation.zh:
看来你和我都会有一个
忙碌的假期季节了

translation.en: -Don't know nothing about it, Satan. -Well, you have yourself a Merry...
translation.zh:
-我什么都不知道 撒旦
-那就祝你圣…

translation.en: Fuck it.
translation.zh: 去死吧

translation.en: [Hailey] Sockatoo is my favorite.
translation.zh: 我最喜欢索卡图

translation.en: No, Baballoon. No, Sockatoo. [Amanda] I thought you liked the pink one.
translation.zh:
-不 是巴巴隆 不 索卡图
-我以为你喜欢粉红色那个

translation.en: She's the sick Wishee. You can tell from her spots.
translation.zh:
她是病了的小愿愿
从她的斑点就能看出来了

translation.en: Mm. Right.
translation.zh: 说得对

translation.en: And what about Happy? Which one's Happy's favorite?
translation.zh: 那么快乐呢？快乐最喜欢哪一个？

translation.en: Happy doesn't have a favorite.
translation.zh: 快乐没有最喜欢的

translation.en: He doesn't like Wishees. Do you, Happy?
translation.zh: 它不喜欢小愿愿 对吧 快乐？

translation.en: He thinks that they're weirdos.
translation.zh: 他觉得它们是怪人

translation.en: We got to go! We're going to be late!
translation.zh: 我们得走了 要迟到了

translation.en: [M.C.] And now, it's the moment you've all been waiting for.
translation.zh: 现在 你们期盼已久的时刻终于到来

translation.en: They call him the man who made Christmas for thousands of underprivileged children.
translation.zh:
人们称他是
让数千贫困儿童圣诞快乐的男人

translation.en: Come on, Mom! It's starting! Come on!
translation.zh: 快点 妈妈！要开始了！快！

translation.en: [M.C.] He's the man who makes the sun shine!
translation.zh: 他是让阳光普照的男人！

translation.en: Sonny Shine!
translation.zh: 桑尼夏恩！

translation.en: Ah!
translation.zh: （桑尼夏恩）

translation.en: Sonny Shine!
translation.zh: 桑尼夏恩！

translation.en: Not just one wish!
translation.zh: 不止一个愿望！

translation.en: -Not just two! -Not just two wishes!
translation.zh:
-不止两个！
-不止两个愿望！

translation.en: -[Sonny] But... -[Hailey] You get three wishes!
translation.zh:
-你可以得到三个愿望！
-你可以得到三个愿望！

translation.en: -Let me hear you say Wishees! -[crowd] Wishees
translation.zh: 让我听到你们说“小愿愿”！

translation.en: You say Wishees! You say Wishees!
translation.zh: 说“小愿愿”！你说“小愿愿”！

translation.en: I can't see!
translation.zh: 我看不见！

translation.en: Why walk, when you can dance!
translation.zh: 既然能跳舞 为什么要走路！

translation.en: -I can't see! -I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
-我看不到！
-很抱歉

translation.en: [Hailey] Let's get closer!
translation.zh: 我们靠近些吧！

translation.en: Hailey? Hailey!
translation.zh: 海莉？海莉？

translation.en: Hailey! Hailey! Hailey!
translation.zh: 海莉…！

translation.en: Don't worry, Happy. We'll go back.
translation.zh: 别担心 快乐 我们会回去的

translation.en: There were too many people, I couldn't see!
translation.zh: 人太多了 我没法看到

translation.en: But I only want one wish. That's not true. Don't be mean.
translation.zh:
可我只想要一个愿望
不是那样的 别那么刻薄

translation.en: Mr. Sunshine! I only need one wish!
translation.zh: 阳光先生 我只需要一个愿望！

translation.en: What do you mean run away? From who?
translation.zh: 什么意思 快跑？要躲谁？

translation.en: Here they come!
translation.zh: 他们来了！

translation.en: Hailey!
translation.zh: 海莉！

translation.en: Hailey!
translation.zh: 海莉！

translation.en: Hailey!
translation.zh: 海莉！

translation.en: Yo, get a load of this snowflake, huh?
translation.zh: 瞧瞧这敏感过头的家伙

translation.en: Little bitch changed up his look since then, right?
translation.zh:
自那之后
小贱人的样子就变了是不是？

translation.en: -Easy money. -No. This is not easy money.
translation.zh:
-这票活儿简单
-不 这不是简单的活儿

translation.en: Dude, chill. Three Scaramuccis
translation.zh:
兄弟 放轻松
三个斯卡拉穆奇家的人

translation.en: against one Bum Fights looking motherfucker.
translation.zh: 对抗一个看起来像小流氓的混蛋

translation.en: All right, we're gonna drop him like a hot deuce.
translation.zh: 我们轻松就能放倒他

translation.en: You never seen Sax doing work. I did.
translation.zh: 你没见过萨克斯干活 我见过

translation.en: What I can't figure is why Uncle Blue would wanna whack this guy.
translation.zh:
我搞不懂的是为什么布鲁大叔
要削这家伙？

translation.en: Maybe he knows too much.
translation.zh: 也许他知道得太多了

translation.en: -Whoa! Mikey! -[all chatter]
translation.zh: 麦奇

translation.en: Oh, my God! Look at you. Welcome home, little bro.
translation.zh: 我的天 瞧瞧你 欢迎回家 小弟

translation.en: -Hey, no one knew you was back. -I left straight from the funeral.
translation.zh:
-怎么没人知道你回来了
-我直接从葬礼那儿过来的

translation.en: Hey, guys, a moment of silence for Don Scaramucci, God rest his soul.
translation.zh:
伙计们 为唐斯卡拉穆奇默哀片刻
愿他的灵魂安息

translation.en: And to think, our little Michelangelo,
translation.zh: 还有想到我们的小米开朗基罗

translation.en: sitting right by the bedside as the great man peaced out.
translation.zh: 在伟人咽气时就坐在他的床边

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对啊

translation.en: Looks like the four Smootchie bros are gonna kick some ass tonight.
translation.zh: 看来我们四兄弟今晚可以大干一场了

translation.en: Hey, take a look at this job we just got.
translation.zh: 来 看看我们刚接到的这票活儿

translation.en: Count me out. I got something for Uncle Blue.
translation.zh:
不用算上我了 我有东西要给布鲁大叔
是唐老大要转交的 我不能等

translation.en: Straight from the Don. It can't wait.
translation.zh:
我有东西要给布鲁大叔
是唐老大要转交的 我不能等

translation.en: -[PAL] What you got, Mikey? -Yeah. Bro. Fuck that.
translation.zh:
-你拿着什么 麦奇？
-兄弟 别管了

translation.en: A little ballistic therapy first, then go kiss the ring.
translation.zh: 先给他来一枪 然后去吻戒指

translation.en: All right, Uncle Freaky ain't going no place.
translation.zh: 好吗 畸形大叔没前途啦

translation.en: -Hey. Watch your mouth, dumbass. -[exhales]
translation.zh: 注意你的嘴巴 笨蛋

translation.en: You kidding me? The Don's dead so all of a sudden
translation.zh:
你逗我玩吗？ 唐老大死了 于是突然之间
我们都要卑躬…

translation.en: -we're supposed to bow-- -Christ's sake,
translation.zh:
唐老大死了 于是突然之间
我们都要卑躬…

translation.en: I ain't even unpacked yet.
translation.zh:
看在老天份上
我连行李都还没打开呢

translation.en: What's up, little Mike?
translation.zh: 怎么了 小麦克？

translation.en: You afraid of getting blood on your Dolce and Ga-fuckin-Bana?
translation.zh: 害怕让你的狗屎名牌衣服沾血吗？

translation.en: [prawn man] So, it turns out they did some research.
translation.zh: 所以看来他们是做了一些调查

translation.en: -Statistical shit. -Listen, dude, could you hurry it up?
translation.zh:
-破统计数据
-老兄 你能快点吗？

translation.en: I have an eleven o'clock, supposed to be here any minute.
translation.zh: 我11点还有客人 他随时会来的

translation.en: They proved that hookers,
translation.zh: 他们证明了妓女

translation.en: see hookers like you, who work the holidays,
translation.zh: 像你这样的在假日也要工作的妓女

translation.en: you share an economic niche with the department store Santa Claus.
translation.zh:
你们跟百货商场圣诞老人
共享了一个客户群

translation.en: It's a time of giving. Empty 'em.
translation.zh: 现在是给予的时节 清空我的存货

translation.en: Empty 'em!
translation.zh: 清空它们！

translation.en: Empty my big shiny Christmas balls.
translation.zh: 清空我闪亮的圣诞蛋蛋吧

translation.en: Now, here's something you don't see every day.
translation.zh: 这还真是不常见

translation.en: I'm your eleven o'clock.
translation.zh: 我是你11点的客人

translation.en: -Sorry, am I early? -Oh, shit.
translation.zh:
-抱歉 我来早了？
-见鬼

translation.en: Well, that's novel.
translation.zh: 这还真是新奇

translation.en: -Cockroach? -Prawn, it's like a shrimp.
translation.zh:
-蟑螂？
-明虾 就是虾的一种

translation.en: -Um, please don't, please... -Look, you need to relax.
translation.zh:
-求你不要 求你了
-听着 你得放轻松

translation.en: If I'd showed up on time, that hammer would be halfway through your skull.
translation.zh:
如果我是准时来的话
那锤子早就劈开你的颅骨了

translation.en: Oh, that's the last weirdo, I swear to God.
translation.zh: 这是最后一个怪人了 我对天发誓

translation.en: Now's not the time to be making big decisions here.
translation.zh: 现在不是在这里做重要决定的时候

translation.en: Hey, hey, I know you.
translation.zh: 嘿 我认识你

translation.en: I don't think so.
translation.zh: 我不那么认为

translation.en: Yeah. You're a... You're a cop, right? You busted me back in the day.
translation.zh: 你是警察对吧？你曾经逮捕过我

translation.en: You... You were a real gentleman. Didn't make a pass or anything.
translation.zh:
你…你是真正的绅士
没有占我便宜我或做其他事情

translation.en: Uh, you told me to get on a bus and go home. Get my act together.
translation.zh:
你叫我坐上一辆公交车回家
让我振作起来

translation.en: You inspired me.
translation.zh: 你鼓舞了我

translation.en: I can see that.
translation.zh: 我能看出来

translation.en: Yeah, well, you don't look like a cop no more.
translation.zh: 你看起来不像一个警察了

translation.en: -What happened? -Yeah, I'd be tickled to death
translation.zh:
-发生什么事了？
-我真要高兴死了

translation.en: to have that conversation with you right now.
translation.zh: 如果现在跟你聊那个话题

translation.en: But I'd prefer to talk about how you're going to pay me back.
translation.zh: 但我宁可谈谈你能怎么报答我

translation.en: Talk to me, bro. What's eating you, hm?
translation.zh: 跟我说说嘛 兄弟 你是怎么了？

translation.en: Huh? I know you. This ain't Disco Mikey.
translation.zh: 我了解你 这不是迪斯科麦奇

translation.en: I saw your Snapchat, the chicks, the wine.
translation.zh:
我看了你在阅后即焚上的更新
妞儿 美酒

translation.en: You must've had the time of your life out there, huh?
translation.zh: 你一定享受了一段愉快时光吧

translation.en: Sure. Best ever.
translation.zh: 当然 有史以来最棒的

translation.en: You guys probably think I got some kind of big inheritance lined up.
translation.zh: 你们大概以为我要继承什么大遗产吧

translation.en: The Old Don hooked me up real good before he kicked it, right?
translation.zh:
唐老大在挂掉之前都帮我安排好了
你们是这么认为吧？

translation.en: What? You saying it ain't true?
translation.zh: 什么？你是说那不是真的？

translation.en: I mean, Don Scaramucci loved you like a son.
translation.zh:
我意思是 唐斯卡拉穆奇
把你当儿子一样疼爱

translation.en: Picked you out of everybody in the family.
translation.zh: 家族里这么多人 他就挑选了你

translation.en: He left me something, all right... but not money.
translation.zh: 他是给我留了些东西 但不是钱

translation.en: -This is the place. -Yo, what's the play, bro?
translation.zh:
-就是这地方了
-兄弟 要做什么？

translation.en: All right, I got high specificity intel.
translation.zh: 好的 我得到了异常精准的情报

translation.en: We're gonna catch this asshole, literally, with his pants down.
translation.zh: 我们会抓到这家伙时 他肯定光着腚

translation.en: [Happy] No, no, no, no. Go, go, go! Don't worry, Hailey. I'll find him!
translation.zh:
不…快跑快跑！
别担心 海莉 我会找到他的！

translation.en: What'd I tell you? Huh?
translation.zh: 我怎么跟你们说的？

translation.en: Holy shit.
translation.zh: 见了鬼了

translation.en: What did I tell you, Mike? It's nothing, right?
translation.zh:
我怎么说的 麦克？
这不算什么 对吧？

translation.en: You're not a fucking tough guy anymore, Sax!
translation.zh: 你不再是该死的硬汉了 萨克斯！

translation.en: Who's this?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: -Pal Swipes Scaramouch. -No, you ain't. That's me.
translation.zh:
-帕尔斯怀普斯斯卡拉穆奇
-不 你不是 我才是

translation.en: Oh, boy. And they told me you were the smart one.
translation.zh: 我的天 他们跟我说你很聪明

translation.en: All right, genius, if you can follow this,
translation.zh: 好吧 天才 看你能不能听懂这个

translation.en: right now you're talking to the man who was hired
translation.zh: 现在跟你讲电话的人

translation.en: to kill the Scaramucci Brothers.
translation.zh: 受雇要杀死斯卡拉穆奇兄弟

translation.en: Now full confession, I am one lazy bastard.
translation.zh:
好了 我坦白交代
我是一个懒惰的混蛋

translation.en: So the problem is, how do I get all you squirrely assholes together in one place?
translation.zh:
所以问题来了 我要怎么把你们几个疯子混蛋
全部集中到一个地方呢？

translation.en: Solution, I call in a hit on that handsome son of a bitch Nick Sax.
translation.zh:
方法是 我散布消息说
要人干掉那混蛋帅哥尼克萨克斯

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: I gather you all together in one place, lined up...
translation.zh:
我把你们都集中到一个地方
一字排开

translation.en: Like a turkey shoot.
translation.zh: 就像瓮中捉鳖一样

translation.en: That's funny. I contracted for three.
translation.zh:
搞笑了 合约里要我干掉三个人
等一下

translation.en: Wait a minute. You're the baby brother, right?
translation.zh:
搞笑了 合约里要我干掉三个人
等一下 你是最小的弟弟 对吧？
瞧瞧你 都长大了

translation.en: Look at you. All grown up.
translation.zh:
你是最小的弟弟 对吧？
瞧瞧你 都长大了

translation.en: -Hands shaking. Asshole flapping. -You...
translation.zh:
-双手发抖 屁眼紧绷
-你…

translation.en: Yeah, I killed your brothers. That's right. It's awkward.
translation.zh: 对 我杀死了你的哥哥们 没错 好尴尬

translation.en: Well, that sucked.
translation.zh: 真疼

translation.en: -Say bye-bye. -Wait, wait, wait, wait! [gasps]
translation.zh:
-说再见吧
-等等！等等！

translation.en: Whatever you're getting paid. I've got something that's worth more.
translation.zh:
不管你这活儿能拿到多少钱
我这儿有更值钱的东西

translation.en: I'm listening.
translation.zh: 我洗耳恭听

translation.en: It's... it's a password.
translation.zh: 是…是一个密码

translation.en: -I just stopped listening. -From the Old Don in Sicily.
translation.zh:
-我不听了
-是西西里的黑手党老大给的

translation.en: Before he died, he gave me a password to an encrypted file.
translation.zh: 他死之前给了我一份加密文件的密码

translation.en: It's a... It's a list of names. It's priceless.
translation.zh:
是…是一份名单
那可是无价之宝

translation.en: Yeah, I don't do priceless. I'm more of a cash and carry kind of guy.
translation.zh:
我不干“无价”的活
我比较喜欢做银货两讫的交易

translation.en: Besides, it sounds like I'd be tortured and killed for it
translation.zh: 再说 听起来似乎我会因此

translation.en: by any number of interested parties.
translation.zh: 被好些利益相关方折磨和杀死

translation.en: So, while you're at it, why not give me, ass cancer?
translation.zh: 所以你还不如免费让我菊花生癌了

translation.en: [sniffles] Please, please.
translation.zh: 求你了 求你了

translation.en: Look, you're in a sharing kind of mood, I get it.
translation.zh: 你现在想分享 我明白了

translation.en: So, just tell it to your brothers.
translation.zh: 所以跟你的哥哥们说去吧

translation.en: [Angel] You... you... you're shot.
translation.zh: 你…你中枪了

translation.en: Yeah. But it's the heart attack I just had that's really got my attention.
translation.zh:
对 但引起我注意的是
我刚刚心脏病发作了

translation.en: I got to join a spin class, eat more kale.
translation.zh:
我得参加个动感单车课程
多吃点羽衣甘蓝

translation.en: What the...?
translation.zh: 搞什么…？

translation.en: Perfect.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: Hey! Hey, hey, mister, what about my money?
translation.zh: 喂…先生 我的钱呢？

translation.en: Mama, please, I been as good as I can. Forgive me, Mama.
translation.zh:
妈妈 求你了 我一直努力做好孩子
原谅我 妈妈

translation.en: Kid, if I remind you of your mama,
translation.zh:
我的老天
如果我让你想起了你妈妈

translation.en: you got bigger problems than a hole in your gut.
translation.zh: 中弹根本不算什么

translation.en: If you just hear my confession, I can move on, Mama.
translation.zh:
如果你愿意听我忏悔
我就可以翻篇了 妈妈

translation.en: Confession? Yeah, sure, knock yourself out.
translation.zh: 忏悔？好吧 尽管说

translation.en: Mama, the world, it's run by devils!
translation.zh: 妈妈 这个世界 它被魔鬼控制了！

translation.en: They... they look like people, but they're devils. [gasps]
translation.zh:
他们…看起来像人
但其实是魔鬼

translation.en: Great Grandpa, he showed me things, things I wish I never saw. [sobs]
translation.zh:
曾祖父 他给我看了一些东西
我希望自己从来没看过

translation.en: I got to talk to you, Mama,
translation.zh: 我得跟你倾诉 妈妈

translation.en: so then I won't have it in me anymore and then I can be free.
translation.zh:
这样我就不必再藏在心里
然后我就可以自由了

translation.en: All right, I already told you once, pal, I won't tell you again,
translation.zh:
好了 我已经跟你讲过一次 伙计
我不会再重复

translation.en: I'm not interested.
translation.zh: 我不感兴趣

translation.en: That was easy.
translation.zh: 还真容易

translation.en: Okay. All right, Nick.
translation.zh: 好吧 尼克

translation.en: All right, you're fine. You're fine. You're fine.
translation.zh: 好了 你没事的…

translation.en: -Looks dead to me. -Less paperwork if he's dead.
translation.zh:
-我觉得是死了
-是死人就不用做那么文书工作了

translation.en: -[groans] -Oh! -Shit! Don't move, sir. Don't move. -Stay down.
translation.zh:
-该死！别动 先生 别动
-退后

translation.en: What the hell is this? Put your guns back in your pants.

我想你知道他们为了问出密码
都会做些什么 除非你先告诉我

translation.en: Password?
translation.zh: 密码？

translation.en: -Oh, I know! Open Sesame! -Seriously?
translation.zh:
-我知道！芝麻开门！
-你认真的吗？

translation.en: -Listen to me. -Go.
translation.zh:
-听我说
-说

translation.en: I think Blue hired you to kill his nephews.
translation.zh: 我认为是布鲁雇你去杀死他的侄子们

translation.en: Mikey just ended up in the wrong place at the wrong time.
translation.zh:
麦奇只是在错误的时间
出现在错误的地点

translation.en: I think there is a goddamn underworld civil war brewing
translation.zh: 我认为有一场黑社会内战正在酝酿

translation.en: and you've landed your sorry ass right in the middle of it.
translation.zh: 而你成功让自己卷入其中

translation.en: I think I can still get you out, but you have to tell me what you know.
translation.zh:
我想我还是能让你脱身的
但你得把你知道的告诉我

translation.en: What I know.
translation.zh: 我知道的

translation.en: That people suck, I don't pay income tax
translation.zh: 我知道人们很恶心 我没交所得税

translation.en: and I no longer feel dirty when I touch myself.
translation.zh: 而且我自慰时不再觉得自己很脏

translation.en: But, beyond that, it's just seems pretty clear that whoever knows this alleged password
translation.zh:
但除此之外 很显然
不管是谁知道这所谓的密码

translation.en: is as good as dead or worse.
translation.zh: 他都死定了 或者更糟

translation.en: That's about it.
translation.zh: 差不多就是这样

translation.en: Oh, Meredith, you're such a pain in the ass. You deserve better than that.
translation.zh:
梅瑞狄斯 你真的很讨厌 但你不该处理这种事
我很感谢你过来

translation.en: Thanks for coming in. I appreciate it and I will tell you this...
translation.zh:
但你不该处理这种事
我很感谢你过来 但我会跟你说这句话…

translation.en: Get the hell out of here.
translation.zh: 赶紧滚吧

translation.en: Comprendo?
translation.zh: 明拜？

translation.en: -It's comprende. It's Spanish. -I know it's Spanish!
translation.zh:
-是“明白”西班牙语
-我知道是西班牙语！

translation.en: All right, then.
translation.zh: 那好吧

translation.en: It is what it is.
translation.zh: 那就这样了

translation.en: It sure ain't what it ain't.
translation.zh: 不这样还能怎样

translation.en: Well, about time she left. What a charmer.
translation.zh: 是时候该走了 她还真是讨人喜欢

translation.en: Look, I don't want to speak out of school, Nick,
translation.zh: 听着 我不想多管闲事 尼克

translation.en: but I think she might have a thing for you.
translation.zh: 但我感觉她对你有意思

translation.en: -Oh, I'm going to lose my lunch. -It's the oxycodone.
translation.zh:
-我的午饭要不保了
-是羟考酮

translation.en: Pull it together, Sax. You're hallucinating. That's bad.
translation.zh:
振作点 萨克斯
你产生了幻觉 那很糟糕

translation.en: Some kind of reaction.
translation.zh: 只是药物反应

translation.en: [Happy] Who you talking to, Nick?
translation.zh: 你在跟谁说话 尼克？

translation.en: You know, I used to know a guy who would talk himself
translation.zh:
知道吗 我以前认识一个
自言自语的家伙

translation.en: and he ended up in the funny farm! He's, like, cuckoo, you know?
translation.zh: 最后他进了精神病院 他有精神病 你懂吗？

translation.en: Bing! Bing! Bing! Cuckoo!
translation.zh: 乒乒乒 有病

translation.en: So, you're some kind of manifestation of my subconscious, right?
translation.zh: 所以你是我潜意识的具现 对吧

translation.en: You lost me at "so".
translation.zh: 我刚没在听

translation.en: Something about a submarine sandwich?
translation.zh: 是在说潜艇三明治吗？

translation.en: Breathe. Breathe. Breathe. Okay, breathe.
translation.zh: 呼吸 呼吸… 好的 呼吸

translation.en: Five, four, three, two, one.
translation.zh: 五 四 三 二 一

translation.en: This is no time for hide and seek, Nick, even though I love it.
translation.zh:
没时间玩躲猫猫了 尼克
虽然我很爱玩

translation.en: Besides, peeking is cheating.
translation.zh: 再说了 偷看是作弊

translation.en: -You're not real. -Of course not. I'm an imaginary friend.
translation.zh:
-你不是真的
-当然不是 我是想象出来的朋友

translation.en: My imagination is very limited.
translation.zh: 我的想象力非常有限

translation.en: It usually involves inflicting pain in ways that may not have occurred to most.
translation.zh: 那通常牵扯到多数人想不到的 各种施加痛苦的方式

translation.en: [laughs] You're funny, Nick, but I ain't your imaginary friend.
translation.zh:
你真有意思 尼克
但我不是你的幻想朋友

translation.en: I don't even want to think about what that would look like.
translation.zh: 我甚至不想去思考那会是什么样子的

translation.en: -I'm Hailey's imaginary friend. -Right.
translation.zh:
-我是海莉幻想出来的朋友
-好

translation.en: Hailey's a little girl, Nick, the sweetest, most adorable little girl
translation.zh: 海莉是一个小女孩 尼克 全世界最甜美最可爱的小女孩

translation.en: in the whole world, but... but she's in real bad trouble and you're the only one
translation.zh: 全世界最甜美最可爱的小女孩 但是她现在有很大麻烦 而只有你能帮我救她

translation.en: -that can help me save her. -[grunts]
translation.zh: 而只有你能帮我救她

translation.en: [chuckles] No exit this way, Nick.
translation.zh: 这边没有出口 尼克

translation.en: [grunts] Jesus. That was a bad one. Damn pills are going to kill me.
translation.zh:
天啊 这么厉害
这些该死的药会要了我的命

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -We got company, Nick! -And he's back!
translation.zh:
-有人来了 尼克！
-又回来了

translation.en: -Some real creepazoids. -Hey, if you want to be useful,
translation.zh:
-是非常诡异的家伙
-如果你想帮忙

translation.en: why don't you tell me how many I'm dealing with?
translation.zh: 不如告诉我要对付多少人

translation.en: Okay, one, two, three, four, uh, five!
translation.zh: 好 一 二 三 四 五个！

translation.en: -Are you sure about that? -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 你确定吧？

translation.en: So, five, I've done five. I can do five.
translation.zh: 五个 不算糟 我可以应付五个

translation.en: Here they come! Here they come! Here they come!
translation.zh: 他们来了…！

translation.en: Tick tock. Time to rock.
translation.zh: 滴答 该起来了

translation.en: No, that's not going to do.
translation.zh: 不 那可不行

translation.en: Hey! Hey! Hey! [grunts]
-[Smoothie] That's better. -Woo.
translation.zh: 那样好多了

translation.en: [Sax] Some help you turned out to be.
translation.zh: 原来你是这样帮忙的

translation.en: No offense, buddy, but I don't see how we're going to save Hailey
translation.zh:
无意冒犯 伙计
但假如你一看到麻烦的迹象就晕倒

translation.en: if you keep fainting at the first sign of trouble!
translation.zh: 我不知道我们要怎么去救海莉了！

translation.en: Why are you whispering?
translation.zh: 你为什么喃喃自语？

translation.en: Okay. Drug-induced dementia is a luxury that you will no longer get to enjoy.
translation.zh:
好的 药物引起痴呆这种好待遇
你是不会再享受到了

translation.en: I am going to need your complete focus and attention.
translation.zh: 我需要你全部的注意力和关注

translation.en: Smoothie?
translation.zh: 思慕雪？

translation.en: Clearly my reputation precedes me.
translation.zh: 显然 我名声在外

translation.en: Well, I heard you like to get pee-peed on if that's what you mean.
translation.zh: 我听说你喜欢被人尿在身上 若你是指那名声

translation.en: -[sniggers] -Thanks for the cosign.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的附和

translation.en: Hey, there's nothing wrong with it, no shame.
translation.zh: 那没什么不对 不用觉得羞耻

translation.en: I hear a lot of people are into that sort of thing. Oh!
translation.zh: 我听说很多人都有那种嗜好

translation.en: I got video!
translation.zh: 我有录像！

translation.en: I beg your pardon? Nothing?
translation.zh: 你说什么？什么都没说？

translation.en: -What? -Look, asshole, let's get this over with.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-听着 混蛋 咱们赶紧完事吧

translation.en: You want Disco Mikey's password.
translation.zh: 你想要迪斯科麦奇的密码

translation.en: -Oh, I'll get that, believe me. -Yeah, of course you will.
translation.zh:
-我会拿到的 相信我
-对 你当然会

translation.en: I'm a tough nut, but you'll crack it, all right.
translation.zh: 我嘴皮子很硬 但你会把它撬开

translation.en: Why don't we just cut out the middle man and just get down to it, huh?
translation.zh: 咱们就把中间的省去 我直奔主题吧

translation.en: I'll spill the beans. I got no illusions that it will buy me a quick death,
translation.zh:
我会坦白交代 我可没痴心妄想
这样你们就会让我速死

translation.en: but I mean, what the hell? We all got places to go, people to meet.
translation.zh:
但我想说 管它呢？
我们都有要去的地方 有要见的人

translation.en: I couldn't have put it better myself.
translation.zh: 这总结的水平我赶不上

translation.en: Yeah, so, the kid is sitting there lying in my arms... [exhales]
translation.zh: 那小子当时就躺在我的臂弯里

translation.en: sour smell of homemade lasagna on his breath
translation.zh:
呼出的气发出一股
自家烤宽面条的酸味

translation.en: as he presses his cold, clammy lips to my ear and...
translation.zh: 他一边把冰冷湿粘的嘴唇靠到我耳边

translation.en: he whispers it to me... right before he croaks.
translation.zh: 一边对我低语 就在他断气之前

translation.en: I'll never forget the words he utters, he says...
translation.zh:
我永远不会忘记他吐出的那几个词
他说

translation.en: "Tinkle, tinkle."
translation.zh: “叮当 叮当”

translation.en: Oh, I am going to get the words, believe me.
translation.zh: 我会问到密码的 相信我

translation.en: But I'm going to take my time.
translation.zh: 但我会慢慢来

translation.en: I'm going to set an example with you.
translation.zh: 我要用你杀鸡儆猴

translation.en: -Do you want to know why? -Not really.
translation.zh:
-想知道为什么吗？
-不太想

translation.en: Because I am a professional.
translation.zh: 因为我是个专业人士

translation.en: I take pride in my work.
translation.zh: 我以我的工作为荣

translation.en: I approach my assignments with precision, discipline and respect for my employers.
translation.zh:
我凭着精准 纪律以及对雇主的尊敬
来完成我的任务

translation.en: You see, Sax, your reputation precedes you as well.
translation.zh: 你看 萨克斯 你也是名声在外

translation.en: You seem to look at each new job as an opportunity to fulfill
translation.zh: 你似乎把每件新工作都视为

translation.en: some half-acknowledged death wish.
translation.zh: 实现你半公认求死愿望的机会

translation.en: You just don't get it, do you, Smoothie?
translation.zh: 你就是不明白 对吗 思慕雪？

translation.en: My life is an ever-swirling toilet that just won't flush.
translation.zh:
我的人生就是一个不停打转
却不会冲水的马桶

translation.en: I don't think I can die.
translation.zh: 我认为我死不了

translation.en: We'll see.
translation.zh: 我们走着瞧

translation.en: Music, please.
translation.zh: 请放音乐

translation.en: Wow, was that as creepy as I felt? Creepy, right?
translation.zh:
那是不是跟我感觉的一样诡异？
很诡异 对吧？

translation.en: [Smoothie] I am going to remove your penis...
translation.zh: 我准备切除你的阴茎

translation.en: in thin slices, like salami... just for starters.
translation.zh:
切成薄片 就像意大利香肠那样
这只是头盘

translation.en: Uh, it's going to take you a long time. You know what I mean?
translation.zh: 那会花很长时间 懂我的意思吧？

translation.en: That's okay.
translation.zh: 天生的

translation.en: I don't think I can watch! Come on, Nick! Do something!
translation.zh:
我想我看不下去了！
尼克！快想个办法！

translation.en: Well, you know, after a while it just gets harder and harder
translation.zh:
知道吗 过了一阵后
要找个坚持下去的理由

translation.en: to find a reason to keep on going.
translation.zh: 就越来越难了

translation.en: There's two kinds of people in this godforsaken world,
translation.zh: 这倒霉的世界上有两种人

translation.en: you worthless, little maggot! Which kind do you want to be?
translation.zh:
你这没用的小蛆虫！ 你想做哪一种？是好苹果？
还是马粪？

translation.en: A good apple, or a road apple? [growls]
translation.zh:
你想做哪一种？是好苹果？
还是马粪？

translation.en: -Oops! I pooped. -Oh, for Christ's sakes.
translation.zh:
-我拉屎了
-看在老天份上

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: [Happy] Yeah, okay. Well, I think you made your point,
translation.zh: 好吧 我想你已经表明态度了

translation.en: so can we go back saving Hailey?
translation.zh: 所以我们能继续救海莉了吗？

translation.en: -Now, is he going to be okay? -[man] No!
translation.zh:
-他会没事吧？
-不

translation.en: No, he is not going to be okay.
translation.zh: 不 他大事不妙了

translation.en: Hey there, didn't see you.
translation.zh: 你好啊 刚刚没看见你

translation.en: Oh, yeah, Papi. Huh?
translation.zh: 好啊 爸爸

translation.en: Like that?
translation.zh: 喜欢吗？

translation.en: I can explain.
translation.zh: 我可以解释的

translation.en: Shoot to wound, man.
translation.zh: 开枪打伤他 伙计 布鲁要他活着

translation.en: -Blue wants him alive. -Well, that's interesting.
translation.zh: 开枪打伤他 伙计 布鲁要他活着 有意思

translation.en: We'll tango later there, angry eyes. Gentlemen.
translation.zh:
愤怒的眼睛 我们回头再跳探戈
先走了

translation.en: [Happy] Let's go this way!
translation.zh: 走这边！

translation.en: -Get him! -No, let's not go that way.
translation.zh:
-抓住他！
-不对 别走那边

translation.en: -[cops shout] -Back off or the horse gets it!
translation.zh: 站住 否则这匹马就遭殃！

translation.en: [cop] On the stairway! Follow me! Let's go!
translation.zh: 跟我来！快！

translation.en: Hold it!
translation.zh: 站住！

translation.en: I'm actually really good at this. Nice jacket.
translation.zh: 我其实挺擅长玩这个 你的夹克不错

translation.en: I'm Doctor Who's This Here and I need some... having a... rough day.
translation.zh:
我叫你是谁医生
我需要一些…今天过得不顺利

translation.en: What are you staring at?
translation.zh: 你在盯什么？

translation.en: Tough tonsillectomy. Kid'll pull through though.
translation.zh:
扁桃腺切除术不顺利
但那孩子会挺过来的

translation.en: Better?
translation.zh: 好点了？

translation.en: -Actually, yeah. -Then, let's go save Hailey! Come on!
translation.zh:
-是的
-那就去救海莉吧！快点！

translation.en: Let's go! Get out of the way!
translation.zh: 别挡道！

translation.en: [Happy] Yerks! More bad guys coming, Nick!
translation.zh: 不好！有更多坏人来了 尼克！

translation.en: I need less bad guys and more good news out of you.
translation.zh:
我需要从你口中听到更少坏人
更多好消息

translation.en: We're in a family-size jar of pickles, Nick!
translation.zh:
我们正处在一个
家庭装尺寸的腌菜瓶里面 尼克！

translation.en: I've no idea what that means.
translation.zh: 不明白是什么意思

translation.en: What the heck, Nick! There's no elevator and you can't fly! Can you?
translation.zh:
搞什么 尼克！这里没有电梯
而且你不会飞！ -你会飞吗？
-三楼

translation.en: Third floor.
translation.zh:
-你会飞吗？
-三楼

translation.en: Oh, yeah. You got the loco eyes, buddy.
translation.zh:
是的 你眼神不对劲
伙计 但你知道吗？

translation.en: You know what? You can't help me save Hailey if you're dead-zo-roni!
translation.zh:
如果你死翘翘了
那就不能帮我救海莉了！

translation.en: Yeah, about this Hailey you keep yammering on about.
translation.zh: 是啊 关于你一直嚷嚷的这个海莉

translation.en: To hell with her and while you're at it, to hell with you.
translation.zh: 让她去死吧 还有顺便你也一起死

translation.en: -[sobs] -Hey, come on, don't do that.
translation.zh: 拜托 别露出那表情

translation.en: How did you know there were five?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道有五个人的？

translation.en: Back in my room, the creepazoids coming for me. You're a manifestation, but...
translation.zh: 在我房间里 那些要抓我的变态 你是幻想的具现

translation.en: -How did you know there were five? -Yerk.
translation.zh:
-你怎么知道有五个人？
-糟糕

translation.en: Whoa! What? Oh!
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Woo-hoo! Are we the best team or what?
translation.zh: 我们是不是最佳搭档？

translation.en: Oh, hey, Merry.
translation.zh: 你好 梅瑞

translation.en: -Nick. -Yerks.
translation.zh:
-尼克
-不妙

translation.en: Can I borrow your car?
translation.zh: 能借你的车吗？

translation.en: You son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 你这混蛋

translation.en: Come on! Come on, where we going, Nick, huh? Where we going, huh?
translation.zh: 尼克 我们要去哪儿？要去哪儿？

translation.en: We? We ain't going nowhere. You heard that nice lady back there.
translation.zh:
我们？我们哪儿也不去
你刚才也听到那位好心女士说了

translation.en: I signed my own death warrant when I iced Disco Mikey.
translation.zh:
我干掉迪斯科麦奇
就等于在自己的死刑执行令上签了字

translation.en: Every scumbag in the city will be looking for me.
translation.zh:
城里的每一个人渣都会搜刮我 -说不定已经开始了
-是没错 但…

translation.en: Uh, I mean, yeah, but...
translation.zh:
-说不定已经开始了
-是没错 但…

translation.en: Yeah, but, yeah, but nothing. I'm getting the hell out of Dodge.
translation.zh: 没什么但是可言的 我要离开道奇

translation.en: Quit your tap dancing. You're ruining the dashboard.
translation.zh: 别跳踢踏舞了 你要把仪表板弄坏了

translation.en: -I didn't want to tell you, Nick. -So, then, don't.
translation.zh:
-我不想跟你说 尼克
-那就别

translation.en: I was afraid of scaring you away. After all, you left her once before.
translation.zh:
我怕把你吓跑
毕竟你离开过她一次

translation.en: -Maybe you just don't want to be a daddy. -What are you yammering on about?
translation.zh:
-也许你只是不想做爸爸
-你在嘀咕什么？

translation.en: -Why do you think I picked you, Nick? -I don't know. Lucky, I guess.
translation.zh:
-你觉得我为什么挑选了你 尼克？
-不知道 我猜是我走运吧？

translation.en: You can say that again. Nick, Hailey is your daughter.
translation.zh: 再给你一次机会 尼克 海莉是你的女儿

translation.en: [evil Santa] ♪ Toys and... toys and... ♪
translation.zh: 玩具和小姑娘 玩具 小姑娘和男孩

translation.en: ♪ Little girls and boys ♪
translation.zh: 玩具 小姑娘和男孩

translation.en: [Hailey] Happy?
translation.zh: 快乐？

translation.en: Happy?
translation.zh: 快乐？
